adjectives.description: windowy (comparative more windowy, superlative most windowy)

entries.meaning: (rare, obsolete) Having little crossings or openings like the sashes of a window. [17th c.]
examples: Let others freeze with angling reeds,And cut their legges, with shells and weeds,Or treacherously poore fish beset,With strangling snare, or windowie net  […]
